title: UST Global Makes Strategic Investment in Sandlot Solutions
text:
Leading electronic health record interoperability, quality and population health management analytics provider powers performance-based contracting
DALLAS and ALISO VIEJO, Calif (PRWEB) October 12, 2015
Sandlot Solutions, Inc . (“Sandlot Solutions”), a leading electronic health record (EHR) interoperability, big data analytics and population health management platform provider, today announced that it has completed transaction for a strategic stock investment of $5 million from UST Global , a leading provider of end-to-end digital solutions and IT services and solutions for Global 1000 companies. UST Global and Sandlot have planned a robust, go-to-market partnership.
“The Sandlot Solutions suite of services is exactly what the value-based healthcare system requires,” said John Seitz, Global Health Group Leader, UST Global. “With the systems integration, business process services and renowned analytic capability of UST Global, we believe Sandlot will expand its important role in revolutionizing healthcare in the United States. We are strong believers in aligning and engaging payers and providers to ensure successful outcomes. Together, UST Global and Sandlot provide a complete solution for supporting the performance-based business models that are emerging to replace the current volume-based healthcare system.”
The Sandlot Solutions health IT platform consists of Sandlot Connect , which supports comprehensive data gathering and exchange; Sandlot Dimensions , which combines a data warehouse with business intelligence tools; Sandlot Metrix , an analytics platform that provides real-time prompts and gap-in-care alerts to the physician’s workflow; and Sandlot Care Assist , a robust care coordination and population health management engine.
“Sandlot enables collaboration between payers and providers, and Sandlot’s secure, private cloud technology delivers extraordinary speed-to-value,” said Richard Helppie, Chairman of Sandlot Solutions. “Uniting data ingestion, analytics and workflow, Sandlot’s platform empowers informed clinical and financial decision making.”
Consumer-centered healthcare and meaningful analytics require integration of clinical, population, social, claims and financial data. UST Global brings domain experience, world-class development resources and strong client relationships. Supporting providers and delivering insights for the care of a specific patient at the point and moment of care require the thoughtful analytics that UST Global is known for and that Sandlot powers.
“Healthcare is pivoting to a more consumer-oriented business model, and Sandlot’s leading technologies provide the type of collaborative care that patients desire,” said Joseph Casper, Chief Executive Officer, Sandlot Solutions. “With a more complete data set and comprehensive view of patient information, providers enhance care quality and improve cost management. Sandlot connects across the full spectrum of providers from physician practices to hospitals and other care sites and translates between different electronic systems.”
“All major health plans have signaled the shift to performance-based contracts,” said Seitz. “Sandlot provides the collaborative tools that will lift the walls on data and lead to a more positive patient experience and a more cost-effective healthcare system.”
About Sandlot Solutions
Sandlot Solutions, founded in 2006, is a leading provider of clinical interoperability and population health management solutions focused on: the ingestion of data from disparate sources, exchange of clinical and claims data across the care community, health data analytics and enhanced care coordination. Sandlot provides the tools and technology that enable healthcare organizations to improve the quality of care, understand and manage risk, reduce costs and transition to new business models. The software-as-a-service, cloud model with configurable technology streamlines data sharing and provides physicians with actionable patient information and analytics at the point of care. Sandlot’s technology works within physicians’ existing workflows using a proprietary, patent-pending digital envelope enabling physicians to proactively address gaps in care at the point of care. For more information, visit http://www.sandlotsolutions.com .
About UST Global
UST Global is a leading digital technology services company that provides powerful solutions for Global 1000 companies. UST Global’s mission is to lead companies through critical digital transformations to drive higher business value. UST Global specializes in six next generation digital services – design, cyber security, mobile, social, analytics and cloud. Powered by the mantra ‘fewer clients, more attention,’ UST Global strives for excellence in providing their clients high quality services and a commitment to long-term success. Headquartered in Aliso, Viejo, California, UST Global has over 15,000 associates; operating in 25 countries across four continents.
